title: rustc segfaults under valgrind with staticlib and empty file

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
```
markus@x4 gecko-dev % rustc --version                                                                                                                                      [8/2735]
rustc 1.18.0-nightly (1785bca51 2017-04-21) 
                                                                                                                                       
markus@x4 gecko-dev % cat /tmp/conftestVB4hBn.rs                                                                                                                                   
pub extern fn hello() { println!("Hello world"); }
```
